articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: It’s getting tougher to buy and sell crypto if you bank in the U.K. These are the latest rules.
articles.title: UK Crypto Crackdown: Which British Banks Allow You to Buy Bitcoin?

articles.author: Andrew Cohen
articles.description: Regulation may be headed for the NFT market, but Sorare CEO Nicolas Julia says new frameworks are needed.
articles.title: Sorare NFTs Should Be Regulated Under 'New Category', CEO Says

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Mass adoption of music NFTs doesn't appeal to electronic music pioneer DJ Agoria. For him, the rarer the better.
articles.title: 'I Don’t Trust in Music NFTs': French Electronic Producer DJ Agoria

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: The crypto exchange will integrate with the cross-chain layer 2 solution linking Ethereum, Tron and BNB Chain.
articles.title: Huobi to Join BitTorrent Chain Ecosystem, Build Blockchain 'Super Network'

articles.description: French electronic music producer DJ Agoria shared with Decrypt what excites him the most about music NFTs, how it informs his work as a generative artist, and why Web3 is all about artists exploring "new ideas that were not possible in Web2."
articles.title: 'We Don't Want to Make Music NFTs Mainstream': DJ Agoria

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: A CoinShares analyst said the latest downturn has been “completely different” than in the past thanks to orderly capital markets.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner Capitulation Has Been 'Completely Different' This Cycle: CoinShares

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Ameen Soleimani, an early contributor to Tornado, has created a fork that aims to be a better version of the blacklisted Ethereum coin mixer.
articles.title: Tornado Cash Contributor Builds New Privacy Tool—And Hopes It Won’t Trigger the Feds

articles.author: Esat Dedezade,Daniel Phillips,Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: At its core, yield farming is a process that allows cryptocurrency holders to lock up their holdings, which in turn provides them with rewards.
articles.title: What Is Yield Farming? Beginner's Guide

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and the wider crypto market were hit hard on Friday morning as the industry weighs concerns around embattled Silvergate.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Plunge as Market Mulls Silvergate Fears

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Sen. Cynthia Lummis and Rep. Patrick McHenry cite the Celsius bankruptcy in refuting an April 2022 bulletin.
articles.title: U.S. Lawmakers Say SEC Directive May Bring “Greater Risk of Loss”

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: "Their books and records are incomplete and, in many cases, totally absent," writes FTX CEO John J. Ray III.
articles.title: Debtors Declare 'Massive Shortfall' in FTX Assets, FTX US Also In the Red

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The network’s much-anticipated Shanghai upgrade, which will enable staked ETH withdrawals, was previously slated for a March release.
articles.title: Ethereum Devs Confirm ETH Staking Withdrawals Pushed to April

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Several crypto firms announced separations from the crypto-friendly bank as it delayed an SEC filing and its stock crashed.
articles.title: Growing List of Crypto Companies Cutting Silvergate Ties

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The boost, however, is largely due to controversial trading activity on rising NFT marketplace Blur.
articles.title: NFT Sales Surge to $2 Billion in February—Highest Since Terra Crash

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The company behind the world's biggest stablecoin has no links to troubled bank Silvergate, according to Tether CTO Paolo Ardoino.
articles.title: Tether Has No Exposure to Sinking Crypto Bank Silvergate, Says CTO

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Getting a master account would grant Custodia access to the FedWire network, which surpassed $1 quadrillion worth of transactions for the first time last year.
articles.title: Crypto Bank Custodia Is Taking on the Fed—Here’s Everything You Need to Know

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Crypto influencer and alleged scammer Newman Perez has more than 668K followers on Instagram—one of them found him in a shopping center in Colombia.
articles.title: Crypto Influencer Confronted On-Camera Over Alleged Scam

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: The EV company's short-lived experiment with Bitcoin helped crypto advocates at Adidas "start the conversation" around blockchain, said its Web3 lead.
articles.title: Elon Musk and Tesla Accepting Bitcoin 'Opened Door' for Adidas' Web3 Plans

articles.author: Ekin Genç
articles.description: Without liquidity, financial systems grind to a halt. In decentralized finance (DeFi), liquidity pools help keep things running smoothly.
articles.title: What Are Liquidity Pools? The Funds That Keep DeFi Running

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: It’s another blow for Silvergate as Coinbase announced that it is no longer accepting payments from the embattled crypto bank.
articles.title: Coinbase Halts Payments With Silvergate Bank

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Though Tezos' native token XTZ has been hit the worst by bearish price action, several other notable layer-1 tokens are also down.
articles.title: Tezos Token XTZ Leads Weekly Losses With 20% Drop

articles.description: Adidas Web3 lead Erika Wykes-Sneyd told Decrypt's Dan Roberts the story of what prompted Adidas to get into crypto (it involves Elon Musk), what the brand has done so far with NFTs tied to physical apparel, and what it's considering next—including token-gated sneaker drops.
articles.title: How Adidas Jumped Into Web3 and What It Plans Next

articles.author: Max Koopsen
articles.description: As Big Tech eyes opportunities in the metaverse, one EU Commissioner has drawn on concerns in Web2 to protect the next frontier.
articles.title: EU Commissioner Says It’s Time to Define ‘Healthy Competition’ in the Metaverse

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Momoguro creators have planned a multi-platform franchise with a game, a TV show, and lots of NFTs.
articles.title: Emmy-Winning, Disney-Backed Baobab Studios Launches ‘Momoguro’ Ethereum NFTs

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: The Arainee CEO has big plans for Web3 and consumer brands, which he believes will be the next gateway to mass adoption.
articles.title: Arianee's Mission Is to Mint 10 Million NFTs With 50 Global Brands in 2023

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Silvergate's stock plunged in the after-hours Wednesday as the crypto-friendly bank delayed filing its 10-K report with the SEC.
articles.title: Silvergate Stock Plunges 31% as Crypto Bank Delays SEC Financial Report

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Developers can now leverage Safe’s new software development kit to build Web3 apps with the help of account abstraction.
articles.title: Wallet Provider Safe Taps Payments Giant Stripe in New Developer Stack Launch

articles.description: Eva Assayag, Web3 lead at Panerai, sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to talk about Panerai's Web3 strategy, which will soon include a "digital passport" sold with every watch.
articles.title: Why 160-Year-Old Luxury Watch Maker Panerai Is Getting into NFTs

articles.description: John Karp, president of NFT Factory Paris and the founder of Non-Fungible Conference Lisbon, spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about the exploding Web3 community in Paris, the concept behind creating a physical gallery for NFTs, and how the existing art community understands NFTs because "everybody understands art."
articles.title: NFT Factory President: 'NFTs Will Be Active in a Bull or Bear Market'

articles.description: Tom Sachs is a conceptual artist whose work has been displayed in museums and galleries all over the world, but he told Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris he never before felt part of an art movement—until he got into NFTs and Web3. He talked about Rocket Factory and the pull of Web3 art communities.
articles.title: What Attracted Artist Tom Sachs to NFTs? Community and Identity

articles.description: Pierre-Nicolas Hurstel, CEO of Arianee, which offers enterprise software to consumer brands to help them launch NFTs tied to physical goods, spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about how much the NFT space is growing despite the bear market, how big consumer brands will take crypto mainstream, and how loyalty programs are going to be the next huge use case for NFTs.
articles.title: Arianee CEO: Big Consumer Brands Are Going to Take Web3 to 1 Billion Users

articles.description: Salesforce's Web3 lead Marc Mathieu sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to talk about the CRM giant's crypto strategy, why "we had to" embrace Web3, and why the crypto wallet is "the new cookie" online.
articles.title: Salesforce Web3 Lead: Every Brand's Web Site Will Support Crypto Wallets

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The Reserve Bank of Australia will work with the private sector to explore more than a dozen use cases.
articles.title: Australia Announces CBDC Pilot and Study for the eAUD

articles.description: Doodles CEO Julian Holguin, former president of Billboard, sat down with Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the strong vibes at the event and the importance of IRL meetups in Web3, what's next for Doodles and the community, and his prediction that many newer projects won't survive the crypto winter.
articles.title: Doodles CEO: Why In-Person Meetups Are Crucial for NFT Communities

articles.description: SuperRare co-founder Jon Perkins sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to talk about the debate over artist royalties, SuperRare's roots in catering to artists, and building through a bear market.
articles.title: SuperRare Co-Founder: We Remain Committed to NFT Artist Royalties

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The Web3 entrepreneur believes crypto's current PR problem is owed to its association with capitalism—but it's not one the industry should shy away from, he says.
articles.title: 'Crypto Can Save the Capitalist Narrative': Animoca Chairman Yat Siu

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Nouns DAO funded the project, which used 3D-printed materials to develop apparel based on the NFT-based open-source IP.
articles.title: Nouns 3D-Printed Fashion Collection Turns Heads at NFT Paris

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Exchange executive Brian Armstrong said his firm is interested in bringing digital assets inside the SEC’s “regulatory perimeter.”
articles.title: ‘Our Interests Are Aligned' With the SEC: Coinbase CEO

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The iconic rapper takes his next step into Web3, this time with crypto gambling.
articles.title: Snoop Dogg Joins Crypto Casino Roobet as ‘Chief Ganjaroo Officer’

articles.description: Avalanche founder and Ava Labs CEO Emin Gun Sirer has been working on proof-of-work cryptocurrencies since before Bitcoin (seriously). He talked to Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott about how Avalanche avoided FTX and how much damage SBF has done to crypto’s image with VCs, why institutions still aren’t backing away from crypto, why Avalanche will succeed in the long run, and trying to cater to both Wall Street institutions and DeFi degens. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Meet the Brain Behind Avalanche

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The gaming gateway eschews Apple's fee model in favor of monetizing "convenience features."
articles.title: Former Metamask Lead Releases HyperPlay Web3 Game Launcher

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The plan would see Binance's U.S. entity acquire Voyager Digital's assets for $1.02 billion, a deal outlined back in December.
articles.title: Voyager Clients Vote 97% in Favor of $1B Restructuring Plan

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: The federated spin-off Bluesky backed by the Twitter founder is now on the App store, but users need to invite to try the beta.
articles.title: Decentralized Twitter Spin-Off Bluesky Now on App Store in Beta

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Stepn’s COO said that the app will be rolling out new features soon after what has been a bumpy ride for the project.
articles.title: Move-to-Earn App Stepn to Launch Suite of New Features ‘Soon’: COO

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Crypto derivatives platform LedgerX told customers it would now be using Signature Bank for its domestic wire transfers.
articles.title: FTX Survivor LedgerX Dumps Silvergate for Signature Bank: Report

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: New entrants to the French market will face stricter regulations, but existing players will have more time to comply.
articles.title: France Moves Ahead With Tighter Crypto Rules for New Entrants

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The right to digital ownership is just one piece of the open metaverse. Users must also be able to bring their assets wherever they want.
articles.title: The Metaverse Needs to Be 'Open' Unlike Fortnite, Roblox: The Sandbox COO

articles.description: Sebastien Borget, founder and COO of the metaverse realm The Sandbox, sat down wit Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the future of the open metaverse and true digital ownership, what's next for The Sandbox, and its current user numbers and stats.
articles.title: Founder of The Sandbox: 'Essential' to Metaverse That Users Own Their Digital Content

articles.description: Playboy's Web3 lead Liz Suman sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to tell the story of how the 70-year-old magazine brand got into Web3 and preview its upcoming MetaMansion in The Sandbox, which will give special access privileges to those with a Playboy Rabbitar NFT.
articles.title: Playboy's Next Step in Web3: MetaMansion in The Sandbox

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The exchange’s Ethereum Layer-2 network is aimed at courting developers of decentralized applications.
articles.title: Coinbase Shares Up 6% Since Unveiling Layer-2 Ethereum Network Base

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The digital entertainment platform plans to expand its already notable offerings.
articles.title: Orange Comet Raises Over $7 Million in New Funding for NFT Media Play

articles.description: Dave Broome, CEO of NFT design and production studio Orange Comet, spoke to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris about how his company takes "large, popular IP" and turns it into NFT content and Web3 worlds around it.
articles.title: Orange Comet CEO: 'We're Trying to Build the Disney of Web3'

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: A leading NFT analytics platform has flagged 80% of recent trades on Blur as “inorganic,” but is it really wash trading?
articles.title: How Much Wash Trading Is Really Happening on Blur?

articles.description: Worldwide Webb is a gaming realm that lets you turn your NFT PFPs (Punks, Apes, Doodles and so on) into playable avatars. Founder Thomas Webb spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about how the game works, the $10m Series A funding it just received, and why he expects we'll soon see NFT games that show what NFT gaming can do in its best form.
articles.title: Worldwide Web Founder: What NFT Gaming 'Should Be and Will Be'

articles.description: Animoca Brands chairman Yat Siu spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about the open metaverse, NFTs and gaming, building through a bear market, and why Animoca believes the future of the industry is culture and gaming.
articles.title: Yat Siu of Animoca Brands: 'The Future of Crypto and Web3 Is Culture'

articles.description: Shiti Manghani, COO of Stepn, the app that lets users earn tokens for exercising, spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about Stepn's current health, its plans to addnew achievement systems for the top users, and parent company Finding Satoshi Labs and its plans to launch more apps.
articles.title: COO of Move-to-Earn App STEPN: 'We're Thriving, Not Just Surviving'

articles.description: Polygon Labs President Ryan Wyatt, the former YouTube Gaming head, helped turn Polygon into one of the crypto industry’s rare winners in 2022. In a lively chat with Dan Roberts and Andrew Hayward, he revealed why the promise of digital ownership pushed him from the gaming world into crypto, and how Polygon has pulled giants like Starbucks, Reddit, and Instagram into Web3. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Ryan Wyatt on Polygon’s Winning Streak

articles.description: NFTs take over Paris on February 23. Decrypt's Stephen Graves interviews NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov about this year's conference, which features speakers from many of the top collections and companies in the space, plus lots of side events. Decrypt will be on hand as a media partner, conducting interviews and moderating panels. See you in France!
articles.title: NFT Paris Founder Alexandre Tsydenkov Previews 2023 Event

articles.description: Paul Bettner tells Decrypt about the challenges he faced while developing his Web3 game "Wildcard."
articles.title: 'Words with Friends' Creator Paul Bettner: Web3 Can Solve Twitch's Limitations

articles.description: Paul Bettner shares his perspective on Web3 gaming platforms and his vision to make games everywhere and anywhere players want them.
articles.title: 'Words with Friends' Creator Paul Bettner on Why He's Building His Next Game 'Wildcard' in Web3
